Platform.Title: [ZebGene-1_0-st] Zebrafish Gene 1.0 ST Array [transcript (gene) version]
Platform.Description:
Affymetrix submissions are typically submitted to GEO using the GEOarchive method described at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/geo/info/geo_affy.html
Jan 29, 2013: annotation table updated with netaffx build 33

Column.Name: total_probes
Column.Description: Total number of probes contained by this transcript cluster.

Column.Name: gene_assignment
Column.Description: Gene name(s) for each assigned mRNA for mRNAs that corresponds to known genes. (multipart)

Column.Name: mrna_assignment
Column.Description: Public mRNAs that should be detected by this probe set based on sequence alignment determined at the time of the current NetAffx annotation update. (multipart).

Column.Name: category
Column.Description: Array design category of the transcript cluster

Column.Name: SPOT_ID
Column.Description: genomic location of the transcript cluster in the version of the genome assembly used at annotation time. Coordinates are standard 1-based (length=stop-start+1).

Sample.Title: control, biological rep 1

Channel.Source: hearts from zebrafish without PHZ treatment
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: PHZ was added to the fish water of the treated group for 30 min every 3 days for 5 weeks. The 30 min incubation with PHZ was followed by a 30 min wash in fish water. PHZ was used at a concentration of 1.25 μg/mL the first week followed by 2.5 μg/mL for the rest of the protocol. The control group followed the same process without the addition of PHZ in the fish water.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA from 3 biological replicates each containing 3 ventricles were isolated per time point using the RNeasy® micro kit (Qiagen). Potential contaminating genomic DNA was digested by DNase I treatment (Qiagen).
Channel.Label: biotin
Channel.Label-Protocol: 250 ng of total RNAs were reverse transcribed into cDNA, then transcribed into cRNAs and labeled into biotinylated cRNA using the GeneChip WT Reagent kit (Affymetrix) according to the manufacturer’s standard protocols

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Arrays were hybridized, washed and stained using the Affymetrix GeneChip WT Terminal Labeling and Hybridization kit.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: GeneChip Scanner 3000 according to the manufacturer’s standard procedure
Sample.Description: Gene expression data from the heart of zebrafish without PHZ treatment
Sample.Data-Processing: Microarray data were pre-processed by Oligo R package using the robust multi-chip analysis (RMA)

Series.Title: Gene expression data from the heart during regeneration in a zebrafish model of heart failure
Series.Summary: Heart Failure (HF) remains the leading cause of mortality and morbidity globally. Novel therapeutic targets to tackle this pandemic are in dire need. Zebrafish, a vertebrate whose heart shares many physiological similarities to the human heart, are able to naturally undergo cardiac regeneration following HF. We used microarrays to analyse gene expression during cardiac regeneration following heart failure
Series.Overall-Design: Heart failure was induced in adult zebrafish using phenylhydrazine (PHZ, anaemia inducer) treatment for 5 weeks followed by a regeneration period of 9 days without PHZ. Whole-genome microarray analysis was performed in heart samples at the end of the PHZ treatment and at different time-points thereafter (2, 5 and 9 days after PHZ treatment discontinuation). Gene regulation patterns were characterized using bioinformatics.
